H0.text: Sporopollenin protects the pollen of seed plants and the spores of seedless plants.

H1.text: Cystosol protects the pollen of seed plants and spores of seedless plants.

H2.text: Cocklebur protects the pollen of seed plants and the spores of seedless plants.

H3.text: Chlorophyll protects the pollen of seed plants and the spores of seedless plants.

A4.text: Sporopollenin thus provides some protection from these damages as well as a physically robust container.

A5.text: Sporopollenin contain phenolic components that absorb both UVA and UVB, acting to protect internal cell components including DNA against ultraviolet damages.
